languages.text:
The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> damage and healing the psyker for <u>psyker's staff power level</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic act{/g}: the psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate measure{/g}: the psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds. At the end of the psyker's next turn, all the psyker's allies will lose <u>(4 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds unless the combat is already over. This psychic power always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Псайкер вытягивает жизнь из цели, нанося ей <u>(уровень посоха × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера)</u> урона и восстанавливая себе <u>уровень посоха псайкера</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. Если псайкер обладает полным запасом здоровья, то восстановление направлено на его союзника с наименьшим запасом здоровья.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g}: псайкер вытягивает жизнь из цели, нанося ей <u>(2 × уровень посоха × пси-рейтинг псайкера)</u> урона и восстанавливая себе и всем своим союзникам <u>(2 × уровень посоха псайкера)</u> здоровья.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Отчаянные меры{/g}: псайкер вытягивает жизнь из цели, нанося ей <u>(2 × уровень посоха × пси-рейтинг псайкера)</u> урона и восстанавливая себе и всем своим союзникам <u>(2 × уровень посоха псайкера)</u> здоровья. В конце следующего хода псайкера все его союзники потеряют <u>(4 × уровень посоха псайкера)</u> здоровья, если бой к тому моменту не завершится. При использовании этой психосилы всегда появляются {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The Psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(Psyker's staff power level + psy rating)</u> damage and healing the Psyker for <u>Psyker's staff power level</u> wounds. If the Psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the wounded Psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.
Heroic act: the Psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × Psyker's staff power level + psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the Psyker's allies and the Psyker themselves for <u>(2 × Psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds.
Desperate measure: the Psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × Psyker's staff power level + psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the Psyker's allies and the Psyker themselves for <u>(2 × Psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds. At the end of the Psyker's next turn, all Psyker's allies will lose <u>(4 × Psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds unless the combat is already over. This psychic power always triggers perils of the warp.

The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level + psy rating)</u> damage and healing the psyker for <u>psyker's staff power level</u> wounds. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.
Heroic act: the psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level + psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds.
Desperate measure: the psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level + psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds. At the end of the psyker's next turn, all the psyker's allies will lose <u>(4 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds unless the combat is already over. This psychic power always triggers perils of the warp.

The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> damage and healing the psyker for <u>psyker's staff power level</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic act{/g}: the psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate measure{/g}: the psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds. At the end of the psyker's next turn, all the psyker's allies will lose <u>(4 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds unless the combat is already over. This psychic power always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> damage and healing the psyker for <u>psyker's staff power level</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic act{/g}: the psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate measure{/g}: the psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds. At the end of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all the psyker's allies will lose <u>(4 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds unless the combat is already over. This psychic power always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

languages.text:
灵能者汲取目标的生命，造成<u>（灵能者法杖力量等级×{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}）</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，同时恢复灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>灵能者法杖力量等级</u>。如果灵能者的生命值已满，此能力会治疗灵能者生命值最低的盟友。
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}：灵能者汲取目标的生命，造成<u>（2×灵能者法杖力量等级×灵能等级）</u>点伤害，同时恢复灵能者与所有盟友的生命值，等同于<u>（2×灵能者法杖力量等级）</u>。
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}：灵能者汲取目标的生命，造成<u>（2×灵能者法杖力量等级×灵能等级）</u>点伤害，同时恢复灵能者与所有盟友的生命值，等同于<u>（2×灵能者法杖力量等级）</u>。在灵能者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，如果战斗依然没有结束，则灵能者所有盟友都会失去<u>（4×灵能者法杖力量等级）</u>点生命值。此{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}必定会触发来自{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}。
languages.original_text:
The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing the psyker for <u>psyker's staff power level</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic act{/g}: the psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate measure{/g}: the psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds. At the end of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all the psyker's allies will lose <u>(4 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds unless the combat is already over. This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
灵能者汲取目标的生命，造成<u>（灵能者法杖力量等级+{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}）</u>点伤害，同时恢复灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>灵能者法杖力量等级</u>。如果灵能者的生命值已满，此能力会治疗灵能者生命值最低的盟友。
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}：灵能者汲取目标的生命，造成<u>（2×灵能者法杖力量等级+灵能等级）</u>点伤害，同时恢复灵能者与所有盟友的生命值，等同于<u>（2×灵能者法杖力量等级）</u>。
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}：灵能者汲取目标的生命，造成<u>（2×灵能者法杖力量等级+灵能等级）</u>点伤害，同时恢复灵能者与所有盟友的生命值，等同于<u>（2×灵能者法杖力量等级）</u>。在灵能者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，如果战斗依然没有结束，则灵能者所有盟友都会失去<u>（4×灵能者法杖力量等级）</u>点生命值。此灵能力量必定会触发来自{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}。

languages.text:
El psíquico drena la vida del objetivo para infligir <u>(nivel de poder del báculo × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del psíquico)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y recuperar <u>nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. Si el psíquico ya tiene las heridas al máximo, este poder cura en su lugar al aliado del psíquico con el menor número de heridas.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Acto heroico{/g}: el psíquico drena la vida del objetivo para infligir <u>(2 × nivel de poder del báculo × factor psíquico del psíquico)</u> de daño y curar a todos los aliados del psíquico y a sí mismo <u>(2 × nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico)</u> heridas.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Medida desesperada{/g}: el psíquico drena la vida del objetivo para infligir <u>(2 × nivel de poder del báculo × factor psíquico del psíquico)</u> de daño y curar a todos los aliados del psíquico y a sí mismo <u>(2 × nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico)</u> heridas. Al final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del psíquico, todos sus aliados perderán <u>(4 × nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico)</u> heridas a menos que el combate haya acabado. Este {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} siempre provoca {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing the psyker for <u>psyker's staff power level</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.

At the end of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all the psyker's allies will lose <u>(4 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds unless the combat is already over. traits.locale_text:
El psíquico drena la vida del objetivo para infligir <u>(nivel de poder del báculo × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del psíquico)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y recuperar <u>nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. Si el psíquico ya tiene las heridas al máximo, este poder cura en su lugar al aliado del psíquico con el menor número de heridas.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Acto heroico{/g}: el psíquico drena la vida del objetivo para infligir <u>(2 × nivel de poder del báculo × factor psíquico del psíquico)</u> de daño y curar a todos los aliados del psíquico y a sí mismo <u>(2 × nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico)</u> heridas.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Medida desesperada{/g}: el psíquico drena la vida del objetivo para infligir <u>(2 × nivel de poder del báculo × factor psíquico del psíquico)</u> de daño y curar a todos los aliados del psíquico y a sí mismo <u>(2 × nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico)</u> heridas. Al final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del psíquico, todos sus aliados perderán <u>(4 × nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico)</u> heridas a menos que el combate haya acabado. Este {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} siempre provoca {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}.

languages.text:
異能者はターゲットの生命力を吸収し、<u>(異能者スタッフ熟練度 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g})</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}をターゲットに与えるとともに、異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を<u>スタッフ熟練度</u>の分だけ回復する。異能者の傷がすでに最大値の場合、異能者の仲間のうち傷が最も少ない者を回復する。
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}：異能者がターゲットの生命力を吸収して<u>(2 × 異能者スタッフ熟練度 × 超能力レート)</u>のダメージを与えるとともに、異能者本人を含む仲間全員の傷を<u>(2 × 異能者スタッフ熟練度)</u>の分だけ回復させる。
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}：異能者がターゲットの生命力を吸収して<u>(2 × 異能者スタッフ熟練度 × 超能力レート)</u>のダメージを与えるとともに、異能者本人を含む仲間全員の傷を<u>(2 × 異能者スタッフ熟練度)</u>の分だけ回復させる。異能者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終了する時点で戦闘が終了していなければ、異能者の仲間全員は<u>(4 × 異能者スタッフ熟練度)</u>の傷を失う。この{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}を引き起こす。
languages.original_text:
The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing the psyker for <u>psyker's staff power level</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic act{/g}: the psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds.

At the end of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all the psyker's allies will lose <u>(4 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds unless the combat is already over. This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
異能者はターゲットの生命力を吸収し、<u>(異能者の杖熟練度 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g})</u>のダメージをターゲットに与えるとともに、異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を<u>杖熟練度</u>の分だけ回復する。異能者の傷がすでに最大値の場合、異能者の仲間のうち傷が最も少ない者を回復する。
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄の行い{/g}：異能者がターゲットの生命力を吸収して<u>(2 × 異能者の杖熟練度 + 超能力レート)</u>のダメージを与えるとともに、異能者本人を含む仲間全員の傷を<u>(2 × 異能者の杖熟練度)</u>の分だけ回復させる。
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}：異能者がターゲットの生命力を吸収して<u>(2 × 異能者の杖熟練度 + 超能力レート)</u>のダメージを与えるとともに、異能者本人を含む仲間全員の傷を<u>(2 × 異能者の杖熟練度)</u>の分だけ回復させる。異能者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終了する時点で戦闘が終了していなければ、異能者の仲間全員は<u>(4 × 異能者の杖熟練度)</u>の傷を失う。この超能力は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}を引き起こす。

{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Отчаянные меры{/g}: псайкер вытягивает жизнь из цели, нанося ей <u>(2 × уровень посоха + пси-рейтинг псайкера)</u> урона и восстанавливая себе и всем своим союзникам <u>(2 × уровень посоха псайкера)</u> здоровья. В конце следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} псайкера все его союзники потеряют <u>(4 × уровень посоха псайкера)</u> здоровья, если бой к тому моменту не завершится. При использовании этой психосилы всегда появляются {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g}.

Псайкер вытягивает жизнь из цели, нанося ей <u>(уровень посоха + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера)</u> урона и восстанавливая себе <u>уровень посоха псайкера</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. Если псайкер обладает полным запасом здоровья, то восстановление направлено на его союзника с наименьшим запасом здоровья.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g}: псайкер вытягивает жизнь из цели, нанося ей <u>(2 × уровень посоха + пси-рейтинг псайкера)</u> урона и восстанавливая себе и всем своим союзникам <u>(2 × уровень посоха псайкера)</u> здоровья.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Отчаянные меры{/g}: псайкер вытягивает жизнь из цели, нанося ей <u>(2 × уровень посоха + пси-рейтинг псайкера)</u> урона и восстанавливая себе и всем своим союзникам <u>(2 × уровень посоха псайкера)</u> здоровья. В конце следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} псайкера все его союзники потеряют <u>(4 × уровень посоха псайкера)</u> здоровья, если бой к тому моменту не завершится. При использовании этой психосилы всегда появляются {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g}.

languages.text:
Der Psioniker entzieht dem Ziel Leben, wobei er ihm <u>(Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g})</u> Schaden zufügt und den Psioniker um {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} in Höhe der <u>Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe</u> heilt. Sollte der Psioniker bereits volle Wunden haben, heilt diese Kraft stattdessen den Verbündeten des Psionikers mit den wenigsten Wunden.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g}: Der Psioniker entzieht dem Ziel Leben, wobei er ihm <u>(2 × Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe × Psi-Wert)</u> Schaden zufügt und sämtliche Verbündeten des Psionikers und den Psioniker selbst um <u>(2 × Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe)</u> Wunden heilt.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g}: Der Psioniker entzieht dem Ziel Leben, wobei er ihm <u>(2 × Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe × Psi-Wert)</u> Schaden zufügt und sämtliche Verbündeten des Psionikers und den Psioniker selbst um <u>(2 × Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe)</u> Wunden heilt. Am Ende des nächsten Zugs des Psionikers verlieren alle seine Verbündeten <u>(4 × Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe)</u> Wunden, es sei denn, der Kampf ist bereits vorbei. Diese psionische Kraft löst immer {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} aus.
languages.original_text:
The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> damage and healing the psyker for <u>psyker's staff power level</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic act{/g}: the psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate measure{/g}: the psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds. At the end of the psyker's next turn, all the psyker's allies will lose <u>(4 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds unless the combat is already over. This psychic power always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Der Psioniker entzieht dem Ziel Leben, wobei er ihm <u>(Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt und den Psioniker um {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} in Höhe der <u>Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe</u> heilt. Sollte der Psioniker bereits volle Wunden haben, heilt diese Kraft stattdessen den Verbündeten des Psionikers mit den wenigsten Wunden.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g}: Der Psioniker entzieht dem Ziel Leben, wobei er ihm <u>(2 × Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe × Psi-Wert)</u> Schaden zufügt und sämtliche Verbündeten des Psionikers und den Psioniker selbst um <u>(2 × Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe)</u> Wunden heilt.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g}: Der Psioniker entzieht dem Ziel Leben, wobei er ihm <u>(2 × Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe × Psi-Wert)</u> Schaden zufügt und sämtliche Verbündeten des Psionikers und den Psioniker selbst um <u>(2 × Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe)</u> Wunden heilt. Am Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Psionikers verlieren alle seine Verbündeten <u>(4 × Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe)</u> Wunden, es sei denn, der Kampf ist bereits vorbei. Diese {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} löst immer {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} aus.

languages.text: Le psyker puise les forces vitales de sa cible en lui infligeant <u>(niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g})</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et en se soignant à hauteur de <u>niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. Si la réserve de blessures du psyker est déjà pleine, ce pouvoir soigne l'allié qui possède le moins de blessures dans sa réserve. {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Acte héroïque{/g} : le psyker puise les forces vitales de sa cible en lui infligeant <u>(2 × niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker × indice psy)</u> points de dégâts et en soignant tous ses alliés ainsi que lui-même à hauteur de <u>(2 × niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker)</u> blessures. {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Mesure désespérée{/g} : le psyker puise les forces vitales de sa cible en lui infligeant <u>(2 × niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker × indice psy)</u> points de dégâts et en soignant tous ses alliés ainsi que lui-même à hauteur de <u>(2 × niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker)</u> blessures. À la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du psyker, tous ses alliés perdent <u>(4 × niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker)</u> blessures, sauf si le combat est déjà terminé. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} déclenche toujours des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing the psyker for <u>psyker's staff power level</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic act{/g}: the psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate measure{/g}: the psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds. At the end of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all the psyker's allies will lose <u>(4 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds unless the combat is already over. This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

Le psyker puise les forces vitales de sa cible en lui infligeant <u>(niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g})</u> points de dégâts et en se soignant à hauteur de <u>niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. Si la réserve de blessures du psyker est déjà pleine, ce pouvoir soigne l'allié qui possède le moins de blessures dans sa réserve.

À la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du psyker, tous ses alliés perdent <u>(4 × niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker)</u> blessures, sauf si le combat est déjà terminé. Ce pouvoir psychique déclenche toujours des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}.
